talk.utter: The blood is on your hands then

talk.author: did:plc:plz7fkmbzwvjhrt6m36as3zs
talk.utter: Interesting take.  My motivation is to make this country's policies work for everyone not just the rich and powerful.

talk.author: did:plc:djgilgzlrzrkoxg526iu7tm7
talk.utter: Well the system says we have 2 candidates, and if you participate or not you are part of the system, and by not voting you assisted in the election of a rich and powerful man that openly stated he would help his rich and powerful friends instead of the woman who spoke up for workers and lower class
